scripts.prismaSetup: yarn prisma migrate dev --name auto --schema prisma/schemaRecords.prisma && yarn prismaGenerate
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn prismaGenerate && tsc && cpy "src/prisma/**" dist/server/prisma --recursive
scripts.prismaGenerate: prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schemaEvent.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schemaEventData.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schemaRecords.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schemaOnline.prisma
scripts.prismaIntrospect: yarn src/prisma db pull --schema prisma/schemaEvent.prisma && yarn prisma db pull --schema prisma/schemaEventData.prisma && yarn prisma db pull --schema prisma/schemaOnline.prisma
